p: From literature reports, up to now, the highest verbascoside specific productivityâ€”165 mg/L/day, was reached in suspension cultures of Harpagophytum procumbens grown in pulse-aerated column bioreactor. In our research, the highest specific productivity was also high and reached in BB and STB 104 and 115 mg/L/day, respectively ( Table 1) [ 40].
